body: Nope. 2016 was the year of the Monkey. Anichira (Andira now in the official English translation, since they're using a specific set of translations of the 12 Yaksha and Yakshini/12 Heavenly Generals that do not originate from the Japanese interpretation of the names) Which means she was released at Midnight on January first, 2016. This Doujin was released in December of that year, many months after the spark system was introduced to the game.
